text: today in Yemen's capital sanaa violence
spread throughout the city much more so

family who are solids greatest tribal
rivals there was a ceasefire between the

the situation there is war in the city

civil war meanwhile the protest

this violence between security forces
and protesters all this is happening
after President Saleh proposal that
